inonepage.display: Hamburg Hack A Ton in one Page

<<.msg: Guess what? This is more Work in Progress than you think!
<<.content: Welcome to the Walkthrough! This will be a series of pages that will guide you through the Hamburg Hack A Ton. If youre done Reading one Page look for a "Next" Button below.
